comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: The name "Sterart" is a typo. This is Jim Stewart (1887-1918; birth name Henry John Loerch), a heavyweight bare-knuckle boxer who fought professionally from 1907 to 1917. There's a recognizable photo of him at Cyber Boxing Zone, and at his BoxRec biography page there's a cigarette card, apparently made from this Bain photo. Among his opponents was Ed "Gunboat" Smith, subject of this Bain photo. They fought in New York on May 9, 1912, and had a rematch in the same city the following October 21. Stewart died in the Influenza epidemic in 1918.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: whyaduck: Thanks!  We'll fix the typo in the source data and reload the description.
